effect.lne_archers.rangers_focus.descrip: Increases Ranged Damage, Haste, reduces movement speed and pull time.
spell.lne_archers.cursed_wither_bolt.des: On arrow hit: {trigger_chance} chance to inflict wither's curse for {effect_duration} seconds and dealing additional {damage} damage.
spell.lne_archers.dragon_breath.descript: On arrow hit: {trigger_chance} chance to create a dragon breath cloud, dealing {damage} damage per second.
spell.lne_archers.dragon_breath.name: Ender Dragon's Breath
spell.lne_archers.glacial_splitter.descr: Defeating Enemies spawns glacial projectiles that deal {damage} damage and freeze enemies for {effect_duration} seconds.
spell.lne_archers.glacial_splitter.name: Glacial Splitter
spell.lne_archers.rangers_focus.descript: Focuses natures energy and slowing you drastically for {effect_duration} seconds, increasing your ranged damage & velocity & decreasing pull time.
spell.lne_archers.rangers_focus.name: Ranger´s Focus
spell.lne_archers.reef_arrows.descriptio: On arrow hit: {trigger_chance} chance to inflict bleeding for {effect_duration} seconds and dealing additional {damage} damage.
spell.lne_archers.reef_arrows.name: Coral Reef Arrows
